existing_implementations.description: Found existing DataTable component with full sorting/pagination support, existing approvals API with all needed endpoints, existing ApprovalsPage with card-based layout (different from this table-based queue view)

approvalsApi.list() fetches all approvals, myPending() gets user-specific approvals
ApprovalRequest type has entityType ('equipment' | 'material'), currentStatus, steps, and createdBy fields
Existing ApprovalsPage uses Card layout with progress bars - this new view should be table-based per design

key_elements: Filter tabs: All, Equipment, Materials, Documents
Table columns: Request Type, Project Name, Submitted By, Date, Priority Badge
Action buttons: Approve, Reject, Review (in each row)
Search bar and New Request button in header
